    logger = logging.getLogger( 'UnitTest' )

[docs]    def test__topic_name( self ):
         s = testStep()
         self.assertEqual( s.topic_name, 'step' )



[docs]    def test__logger_name( self ):
        s = testStep()
        self.assertEqual( s.logger_name, Constants.LogKeys.steps )


    @patch( 'steps.test.abc_step_test.Common.send' )

[docs]    def test_getUseCount_when_count_is_zero( self, send ):
        device = 'device'
        port = 'port'
        N = testStep()

        N.counter = 0
        data = {}
        data[Constants.DataPacket.device] = device
        data[Constants.DataPacket.port] = port

        listeners = ['a', 'b', 'c']
        N.getUseCount( 1, data, listeners )


    @patch( 'steps.test.abc_step_test.Common.send' )

[docs]    def test_getUseCount( self, send ):
        device = 'device'
        port = 'port'
        N = testStep()

        N.counter = 111
        data = {}
        data[Constants.DataPacket.device] = device
        data[Constants.DataPacket.port] = port

        listeners = ['a', 'b', 'c']
        N.getUseCount( 1, data, listeners )
        N.send.assert_called_once_with( 0, {'device': device, 'port': port}, ['a', 'b', 'c'] )


    @patch( 'steps.test.abc_step_test.Common.send' )

[docs]    def test_getErrorCount( self, send ):
        device = 'device'
        port = 'port'
        N = testStep()

        N.errors = 10
        data = {}
        data[Constants.DataPacket.device] = device
        data[Constants.DataPacket.port] = port

        listeners = ['a', 'b', 'c']
        N.getErrorCount( 1, data, listeners )
        N.send.assert_called_once_with( 0, {'device': device, 'port': port}, ['a', 'b', 'c'] )


    @patch( 'steps.test.abc_step_test.Common.send' )

[docs]    def test_getErrorCount_when_error_count_is_zero( self, send ):
        device = 'device'
        port = 'port'
        N = testStep()

        N.errors = 0
        data = {}
        data[Constants.DataPacket.device] = device
        data[Constants.DataPacket.port] = port

        listeners = ['a', 'b', 'c']
        N.getErrorCount( 1, data, listeners )
